Comment: He just scored a touchdown. Can you really call a game on a touchdown in the 1st Quarter. I would like to call victory on this but realistically we still have much more time in the game folks.

Comment: This is more like winning the first game of your season.  Yes you need to win more to make the playoffs and win a Super Bowl, but you have to win one game at a time.
